RO3J99
Little King's Story

Time 11 A.M. [xtatu]
42000000 90000000
043E8908 41300000
E0000000 80008000

Rough time guide:
3E800000 = 00:15am
3F800000 = 1am
40010000 = 2am
40806000 = 4am
40C00000 = 6am
41000000 = 8am
41300000 = 11am
41900000 = 6pm
41B00000 = 10pm
41B80000 = 11pm
41C00000 = Midnight
